title: Indian PM Narendra Modi's hacked Twitter account told 73.4 million followers that the country would distribute 500 bitcoins among its citizens
content:
1. Indian PM Narendra Modi's hacked Twitter account told 73.4 million followers that the country would distribute 500 bitcoins among its citizens  Yahoo Finance
  2. Narendra Modi's Twitter account hacked with announcement India would adopt Bitcoin  CNN
  3. Indian Prime Minister Modi’s Twitter handle ‘briefly compromised’  Al Jazeera English
  4. Indian prime minister's Twitter account 'very briefly compromised' | TheHill  The Hill
  5. India Modi's personal Twitter handle 'briefly compromised' -Prime Minister's Office  Reuters India
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Indian PM Narendra Modi's hacked Twitter account told 73.4 million followers that the country would distribute 500 bitcoins among its citizens  Yahoo Finance
Narendra Modi's Twitter account hacked with announcement India would adopt Bitcoin  CNN

localize.title: インドのナレンドラ・モディ首相のハッキングされたTwitterアカウントは、7,340万人のフォロワーに、国が国民に500ビットコインを配布すると伝えていました。
印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的黑客推特账户告诉7340万粉丝，该国将在其公民中分发500个比特币
印度總理納倫德拉-莫迪的黑客推特賬戶告訴7340萬粉絲，該國將在其公民中分發500個比特幣
